<a id="SkeletonProfile"></a>

# SkeletonProfile

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [SkeletonProfileHumanoid](SkeletonProfileHumanoid.md)

Base class for a profile of a virtual skeleton used as a target for retargeting.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This resource is used in [EditorScenePostImport](EditorScenePostImport.md). Some parameters are referring to bones in [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md), [Skin](Skin.md), [Animation](Animation.md), and some other nodes are rewritten based on the parameters of **SkeletonProfile**.

\ **Note:** These parameters need to be set only when creating a custom profile. In [SkeletonProfileHumanoid](SkeletonProfileHumanoid.md), they are defined internally as read-only values.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Retargeting 3D Skeletons](../tutorials/assets_pipeline/retargeting_3d_skeletons.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="SkeletonProfile_signal_profile_updated"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**profile_updated**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_signal_profile_updated)

This signal is emitted when change the value in profile. This is used to update key name in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) and to redraw the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.

\ **Note:** This signal is not connected directly to editor to simplify the reference, instead it is passed on to editor through the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **TailDirection**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection)

<a id="SkeletonProfile_constant_TAIL_DIRECTION_AVERAGE_CHILDREN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TailDirection](SkeletonProfile.md#enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection) **TAIL_DIRECTION_AVERAGE_CHILDREN** = `0`

Direction to the average coordinates of bone children.<a id="SkeletonProfile_constant_TAIL_DIRECTION_SPECIFIC_CHILD"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TailDirection](SkeletonProfile.md#enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection) **TAIL_DIRECTION_SPECIFIC_CHILD** = `1`

Direction to the coordinates of specified bone child.<a id="SkeletonProfile_constant_TAIL_DIRECTION_END"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TailDirection](SkeletonProfile.md#enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection) **TAIL_DIRECTION_END** = `2`

Direction is not calculated.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonProfile_property_bone_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **bone_size** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_property_bone_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bone_size**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_bone_size**\ (\ )

The amount of bones in retargeting section's [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor. For example, [SkeletonProfileHumanoid](SkeletonProfileHumanoid.md) has 56 bones.

The size of elements in [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) updates when changing this property in it's assigned **SkeletonProfile**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_property_group_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **group_size** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_property_group_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_group_size**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_group_size**\ (\ )

The amount of groups of bones in retargeting section's [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor. For example, [SkeletonProfileHumanoid](SkeletonProfileHumanoid.md) has 4 groups.

This property exists to separate the bone list into several sections in the editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_property_root_bone"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **root_bone** = `&""` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_property_root_bone)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_root_bone**\ (\ value\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ )
- [StringName](StringName.md) **get_root_bone**\ (\ )

A bone name that will be used as the root bone in [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md). This should be the bone of the parent of hips that exists at the world origin.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_property_scale_base_bone"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **scale_base_bone** = `&""` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_property_scale_base_bone)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_scale_base_bone**\ (\ value\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ )
- [StringName](StringName.md) **get_scale_base_bone**\ (\ )

A bone name which will use model's height as the coefficient for normalization. For example, [SkeletonProfileHumanoid](SkeletonProfileHumanoid.md) defines it as ``Hips``.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_find_bone"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **find_bone**\ (\ bone_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_find_bone)

Returns the bone index that matches `bone_name` as its name.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_bone_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_bone_name**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_bone_name)

Returns the name of the bone at `bone_idx` that will be the key name in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md).

In the retargeting process, the returned bone name is the bone name of the target skeleton.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_bone_parent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_bone_parent**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_bone_parent)

Returns the name of the bone which is the parent to the bone at `bone_idx`. The result is empty if the bone has no parent.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_bone_tail"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_bone_tail**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_bone_tail)

Returns the name of the bone which is the tail of the bone at `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_group"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_group**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_group)

Returns the group of the bone at `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_group_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_group_name**\ (\ group_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_group_name)

Returns the name of the group at `group_idx` that will be the drawing group in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_handle_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_handle_offset**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_handle_offset)

Returns the offset of the bone at `bone_idx` that will be the button position in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.

This is the offset with origin at the top left corner of the square.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_reference_pose"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **get_reference_pose**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_reference_pose)

Returns the reference pose transform for bone `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_tail_direction"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TailDirection](SkeletonProfile.md#enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection) **get_tail_direction**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_tail_direction)

Returns the tail direction of the bone at `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_get_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ group_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_get_texture)

Returns the texture of the group at `group_idx` that will be the drawing group background image in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_is_required"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_required**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_is_required)

Returns whether the bone at `bone_idx` is required for retargeting.

This value is used by the bone map editor. If this method returns ``true``, and no bone is assigned, the handle color will be red on the bone map editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_bone_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bone_name**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), bone_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_bone_name)

Sets the name of the bone at `bone_idx` that will be the key name in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md).

In the retargeting process, the setting bone name is the bone name of the target skeleton.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_bone_parent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bone_parent**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), bone_parent\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_bone_parent)

Sets the bone with name `bone_parent` as the parent of the bone at `bone_idx`. If an empty string is passed, then the bone has no parent.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_bone_tail"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bone_tail**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), bone_tail\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_bone_tail)

Sets the bone with name `bone_tail` as the tail of the bone at `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_group"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_group**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), group\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_group)

Sets the group of the bone at `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_group_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_group_name**\ (\ group_idx\: [int](int.md), group_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_group_name)

Sets the name of the group at `group_idx` that will be the drawing group in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_handle_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_handle_offset**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), handle_offset\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_handle_offset)

Sets the offset of the bone at `bone_idx` that will be the button position in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.

This is the offset with origin at the top left corner of the square.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_reference_pose"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_reference_pose**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), bone_name\: [Transform3D](Transform3D.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_reference_pose)

Sets the reference pose transform for bone `bone_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_required"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_required**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), required\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_required)

Sets the required status for bone `bone_idx` to `required`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_tail_direction"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_tail_direction**\ (\ bone_idx\: [int](int.md), tail_direction\: [TailDirection](SkeletonProfile.md#enum_SkeletonProfile_TailDirection)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_tail_direction)

Sets the tail direction of the bone at `bone_idx`.

\ **Note:** This only specifies the method of calculation. The actual coordinates required should be stored in an external skeleton, so the calculation itself needs to be done externally.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonProfile_method_set_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_texture**\ (\ group_idx\: [int](int.md), texture\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonProfile_method_set_texture)

Sets the texture of the group at `group_idx` that will be the drawing group background image in the [BoneMap](BoneMap.md) editor.
